desc.cn:

desc.en:
After the controlled operator's <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> or Finisher hits the enemy, Laevatain absorbs <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> from nearby enemies. 
Every stack of <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> absorbed gives Laevatain 1 stack of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</> (max stacks: {max_stack:0}). 
After reaching {max_stack:0} stacks, DMG dealt by Laevatain ignores <@ba.vup>{100*ignore_fire_resist:0}</> <@ba.fire>Heat Resistance</> of the enemy for {ignore_fire_resist_duration:0}s. 
<@ba.info>Laevatain also absorbs Heat Infliction from enemies defeated nearby.</>

After the controlled operator's <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> or Finisher hits the enemy, Laevatain absorbs <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> from nearby enemies.

<@ba.info>Laevatain also absorbs Heat Infliction from enemies defeated nearby.</>

desc.cn: 天赋<@ba.key>活着的旗帜</>效果加强：获得<@ba.key>士气激昂</>所需的技力恢复量降低至<@ba.vup>{atb_gain:0}</>点。自身<@ba.key>士气激昂</>最大叠加层数<@ba.vup>+{max_stack_owner-3}</>。
desc.en: Talent <@ba.key>The Living Banner</> improved: Amount of SP recovery needed to gain <@ba.key>Fervent Morale</> is reduced to <@ba.vup>{atb_gain:0}</>. Max <@ba.key>Fervent Morale</> stacks on self <@ba.vup>+{max_stack_owner-3}</>.

desc.cn: 连携技<@ba.key>盈月邀击</>冷却时间<@ba.vup>{coolDown:0}</>秒，且技力恢复量变为原本的<@ba.vup>{atb_ratio:0.0}</>倍。
desc.en: Combo skill <@ba.key>Full Moon Slash</> improved: Length of cooldown <@ba.vup>{coolDown:0}</>s; SP recovery is increased to <@ba.vup>{atb_ratio:0.0}</> times the original.

desc.cn:
战斗中，通过自身技能每恢复<@ba.vup>{atb_gain:0}</>点技力后，获得持续<@ba.vup>{duration:0}</>秒的<@ba.key>士气激昂</>。
<@ba.key>士气激昂</>效果：攻击力<@ba.vup>+{atk_up:0%}</>，源石技艺强度<@ba.vup>+{physpell_up:0}</>。
<@ba.info>该效果最多叠加3层，每层单独计算时间。</>
desc.en:
During battle, recovering <@ba.vup>{atb_gain:0}</> SP with his own skills grants <@ba.key>Fervent Morale</> for <@ba.vup>{duration:0}</>s. 
<@ba.key>Fervent Morale</> effects: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk_up:0%}</> and Arts Intensity <@ba.vup>+{physpell_up:0}</>. 
<@ba.info>This effect can reach 3 stacks. Duration of each stack is counted separately.</>
